input.sentences: these are my two best friends .
they come over for a housewarming party along with other friends .
everyone was feeling at home | and both said i did a fantastic job at decorating .
we sat down for a quick luch .
then we took some pictures to send yo everyone that could not make it that day !
output.sentences: My friends threw me a party.
The party was a housewarming with new friends from work.
I have a new job and a new home and I'm feeling great.
My friend and I sat down and had a quick lunch.
Be sure to send your pictures to me.
